snippet: Jockey Frankie Dettori was barred from racing for six months by French horse racing stewards after a positive drug test.
abstract: Jockey Frankie Dettori is barred from racing for six months by French horse racing stewards following a positive drug test.
lead_paragraph: Jockey Frankie Dettori was barred from racing for six months by French horse racing stewards after a positive drug test.

headline.main: Dettori Suspended for Positive Drug Test
